# play_animation_controller interface

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/animation/playanimation/play_animation_controller
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T07:07:19.678248

---

An interface for playing an animation on an object.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /Fortnite.com/Animation/PlayAnimation }` |

## Members

This interface has functions, but no data members.

### Functions

| Function Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [`PlayAndAwait`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/animation/playanimation/play_animation_controller/playandawait) | Play an animation sequence. |
| [`Play`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/animation/playanimation/play_animation_controller/play) | Start an animation sequence and obtain an instance to query and manipulate. |
